website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance 847 v3 met the expectations of consumers when it came to comfort. People liked that the sole provided stability for walking and that their feet did not feel fatigued after using it. However, a good number of users were not satisfied with the support and price of the footwear.
pros: The majority remarked that the New Balance 847 v3 was extremely comfortable for extended periods of wear
Many of the users claimed that the shoe delivered a perfect fit
It was considered a great walking shoe because of its sturdy sole unit by numerous testers
A good number of people liked the soft cushioning of the trainer because their feet didn’t feel tired after using it
The product was deemed durable by several consumers
Some reviewers liked the lightweight nature of the footwear
cons: Plenty of purchasers complained that the footwear provided insufficient support and had to return it
The shoe was considered expensive for a walking shoe by many users
Numerous individuals noticed some quality issues, such as a seam inside that rubbed against the toes, the stiff collar that irritated the ankle, and the upper that quickly detached from the midsole

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little snug compared to my previously purchased NB shoes. I had to replace the shoelaces, they were too short when using the lace locks. Speaking of which, the holes for the laces were poorly made, the hole in the leather and the hole in the liner did not match up at all. Very little arch support. Edited to add: Even worse quality of manufacturing than I thought. One of the lace holes tore out and the shoe are barely two months old.
customer_reviews.author: Sven Allenbach-Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Not New Balance quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were purchased 6 months ago in 4/18. I have another pair of New Balance and alternate the them every day. The lineing is disintegrating, NOT New Balance quality
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: I have only one thing negative to say - I would like to see made in USA 100%. Not 70% imported 30% On the positive side this shoe is true to size. I purchased a walking shoe. I mistakenly ordered the next size bigger as most foreign countries are made that way. I purchased these shoes from Amazon so the return was smooth and no out of pocket money needed. I love the shoe and from day one the shoe has performed perfectly and is completely comfortable. I will be staying with New Balance (USA) made from now on. I highly recommend NB to every serious walker, runner or just out for a stroll man or woman.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Might be tight for you
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing 847 shoes for several years because they're very comfortable for everyday wear. V2 and V3 both run smaller than the V1. V3 seems lighter than both. I've noticed that water gets into the V3 more than with the earlier versions, perhaps there's more mesh and less vinyl on the sides. Also, the curve seems tighter so that my little toes are getting crushed a bit more than than the earlier versions. I think V2 was a better shoe. BTW, I wear 11 6E (very wide).
customer_reviews.author: Silicon Valley Designer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered a pair of Brooks Addiction walking shoes and returned them prior to ordering these. The Brooks were far stiffer and too wide, even in a "B" width. These have proven themselves to be comfortable and stable walking shoes. For me, a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: sqbill

customer_reviews.title: Fit as hoped!
customer_reviews.text: This New Balance model and the New Balance #928 were recommended by my podiatrist. My wife has been wearing a 928 for years and likes it, so I ordered this 847 and a 928 in 8.5 EE size. The shoe felt great the instant I tried it on and great after about a mile fast walk. I have a somewhat wide foot and this EE width is spot-on. The toe box is fine, not too large or small. think I'll order a spare set or two. Bonus: this shoe was assembled in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: J. Canfield

customer_reviews.title: Size up - width
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 4E because I am an Italian with fat feet. My Nike's were 4E and my Sketchers were 4E, and they fit fine. When I ordered these I got a 4E too. Unfortunately, they were too slim and would not stretch like leather shoes since they are 100% man made material. They fit just fine lengthwise, and seemed rather comfortable for the few moments I had them on. As you can imagine, I did not do any walking in these so I cannot comment on that. Even though I wanted to keep these and walk in them, i had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: M. FALINA

customer_reviews.title: The only sneaker I use
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. It fits great and lasts 6 months of everyday use. I walk 15 miles a week consistently. Rain or shine. Ok - maybe not in the rain... I own grey and black, and trade off so they seem to last a bit longer. The black absolutely feels "stiffer" than the grey color. They seem to give more support, but are not as sporty looking. Either way, these are the only shoes I have used for the past several years. Worth the few dollars extra for a made in the USA made!
customer_reviews.author: maxi

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: I have hard-to-fit feet. I almost always wear New Balance shoes since I've had the best luck finding shoes that will fit comfortably. I use these shoes for exercise walking (I usually walk 2 miles on pavement) and general wear. I use SOLE inserts with these shoes. These shoes are breathable and supportive with good cushioning and the soles have a pretty good grip on both dry and wet surfaces. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Weatherbird

customer_reviews.title: Finally a true wide shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I am happier than normal. Finding any shoe that fits regarding width is a good day. I must have returned 20 pairs over the past 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This shoe model in the New Balance brand is designed for the special needs of my pronated arches. I walk at least three to five miles everyday and really need the stability that these shoes provide. I have bought these shoes before from Amazon and was very pleased with fit and price. The price offered this time was really great. Delivery was a day early, even in holiday time. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit Fine But Fell Apart With Little Use
customer_reviews.text: I'm a longtime devotee of New Balance athletic shoes. Still I figured New Balance is subject to financial pressures like other successful companies so I didn't buy their cheaper shoes. I bought this $129 pair. So you can imagine I'm pretty disappointed that after 6 months - and only light use - the tongue of one shoe fell out. It just detached at its base. This is ridiculous! Shoddy design and poor testing.
customer_reviews.author: Bill A

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of walking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have bought this pair of walking shoes from New Balance. I have had multiple stress fractures in my ankles, as well as collapsing arches. These shoes keep me on my feet and active while reducing wear and tear. I work as a nurse, which requires me to be on my feet for twelve hours a day and I wouldn’t be able to do it without a great pair of shoes. This pair of walking shoes deliver!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Bachman

customer_reviews.title: OK shoe, but kind of mediocre for what I expected and the price
customer_reviews.text: OK shoe, but kind of mediocre for what I expected and the price. Normally a top line new balance shoe is extremely high quality and comfort. This shoe feels more like the lower quality versions of new balance, or other cheaper shoes. Not quite the level of comfort that I would like. Good for width and sizing though.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Karich

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of 624’s and tried them on but they didn’t have the fit I was looking for. Upon visiting a retail shoe store they had a pair of 847’s on display so I asked the shoe sales person the difference between the two and he cited that the 847 was an ideal walking shoe which was what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Gerrit DeGraaf

customer_reviews.title: Good Stable Walking Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and use the NB 847 with orthonic inserts. These sneakers are very stable and wear very evenly. I am on my 2nd pair V2 and now V3. The V2 and V3 have a slight cosmetic differences, but I have not noticed any difference in fit or function. Its a good stable sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon1234

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my dad who has bunions and neuropathy in his feet. I ordered the 9 x-wide and they fit him perfectly. He loves the shoes and says they are very comfortable and don't hurt his feet like so many others he's tried. They give him a lot of much-needed support.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S., Reidsville,NC

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes so much that I bought a second pair. Very comfortable. I have wide feet and the 3 wide works perfectly for me. I've bought four other styles off New Balance sneakers in the past six months or so and these fit me the best.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable walking shoes. Great support and outsoles are great. My only issue is mine squeak when I walk. I've never experienced this with the previous 847 generations. This has been happening for the past 3 weeks and they still squeak.
customer_reviews.author: Joey D

customer_reviews.title: Length Fits True
customer_reviews.text: The correct fit for my problem feet is 12.5 C. I own 2 pairs of NB 847v2 which I had to return for a different size. Therefore I somewhat new what to expect in other support qualities of the shoe. Thank goodness for a shoe that the size is true and assembled in America.. If the width does run a little narrow, as others reviewed, it is a good thing for me. It fits better than size B ( Narrow) and size D (Medium). Custom orthotics can be installed by removing factory insoles, if desired.
customer_reviews.author: Bounty Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Tight toe box
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable at all. Too tight near the big toe and lots of friction. These are very flat shoes and offer almost zero support and cushion. Lasted about an hour and I literally had to come home and take them off. I have had much better luck with Brooks.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Size and width
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to the New Balance 928, and actually thought that's what I was ordering, and this one came. It's pretty good, all things considering. I was wearing a 928 2E, and had trouble trying to correlate this with "wide, extra wide, extra extra wide" which seems to be the new nomenclature. I like this shoe, although owing to the peculiarities of my feet, I should have gotten an "extra extra" wide. But, still a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is the MOST important attribute
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a pair of shoes like this for a very long time! I needed arch support... check. Like weight... check. I have peripheral neuropathy (nerve pain) in my feet, and walking can be quite painful sometimes. So, comfort is the MOST important attribute for me. Every year when we vacation we do a LOT of walking, and I've given these a good trial and I feel these will make awesome walking shoes for me.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: 847v3..New Balance...simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best walking shoe made today. I walk 3 miles each morning, 52 weeks each year with 2 white/yellow labs while wearing this shoe. I wear the black pair on rainy days and the white pair on clear days. I replace them every 6-7 months!
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: The Rollbar is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these shoes for years. I thought I would have to stop walking due to foot pain. the pain was due to feet rolling outward due to a short arch tendon. These shoes have eliminated the pain. The durability is also excellent. I average 6 miles per day over each year. These shoes last up to a year. They last until I wear through the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Barker

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I have walked miles in these shoes and have enjoyed the comfort. I did not realize how uncomfortable my other shoes were until I started walking a mile in these shoes. I would recommend to anyone who does any walking to have a pair of the shoes for that purpose only.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Lots of support and cushioning. Much better than NB 1080v9 I tried last year- much more padding around my achilles. I walk 4-5 miles 5X week and these have been very comfortable and show very little wear after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.author: George A

customer_reviews.title: Walking and every day use!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were specifically singled out by my podiatrist for walking. In my case I use a custom orthotic Rx for my foot issues. Being black in color I wear these to all functions without being to casual. Of course I'm retired and don't wear dress shoes any more. LOL
customer_reviews.author: bergtron

customer_reviews.title: Great Fitting Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Order was processed and shipped quickly and delivered as scheduled. Shoes fit as expected and the depth and width (2E) allow my orthotics inserts to fit perfectly. Very comfortable and easy to break in making my ability to walk much easier. I recommend these for those looking for foot support and control while walking with supination or pronation issues.
customer_reviews.author: Zeeb

customer_reviews.title: Like a lot
customer_reviews.text: I only buy New Balance and there is a reason why seems to be the only sneakers I buy that don't leave my feet hurting at the end of the day I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: James  Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and stability
customer_reviews.text: The fit was as expected, comfortable, snug around my foot with a good heel fit and counter. The wide shoe (so far only NB makes wide sizes available so readily. As far as I know) allows my foot to spread comfortably and and flex without being cramped while I walk.
customer_reviews.author: GaryP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, excellent seller
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this shoe for years through many redesigns. It is comfortable and durable. First time ordering online. Arrived as described on time.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth pair of the NB 847 I have purchased. They are very comfortable and last a long time under a lot of abuse. Wear every morning while walking the dog. Very fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have very wide feet and need a wide toe box and the bottom of my feet are very sensitive. this shoe is extremely comfortable for me. I first purchased a gray pair and liked them so well that I purchased a pair of white ones.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes with two problems--one minor, the other not.
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes very much and have bought several pairs. However, with this pair and some of the previous pairs the laces are too short to make it easy to tie a double bow. Also, with all the shoes, after time the internal lining at the heel breaks down. Please reinforce that lining.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a very narrow foot and it is very hard to find shoes that fit. New Balance is about the only company that makes a mens walking shoe in a 2A width and its a quality shoe!
customer_reviews.author: T. Reid

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my feet and my toes hurt, but I walk every day 4-5 miles. These shoes let me keep on walking even as my feet get worse. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: C. DeJong

customer_reviews.title: well made, fits well .
customer_reviews.text: fits well if you have a wide foot. overall comfort though the insole could have a bit more cushion support. good price value.
customer_reviews.author: Troutman

customer_reviews.title: Inferior quality/overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Replaced a 3yr old 800 series but is nowhere near the quality. Disappointing to say the least. Won't be buying shoes on line again.
customer_reviews.author: Arch S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Very comfortable and it was available in a wide width. I am satisfied with the purchase. Have used these on several long walks and they perform well.
customer_reviews.author: G. Speck

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were recommended to my husband by his podiatrist. They work well for him and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Annlyn

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased NB shoes for over 20 years, because I wear orthotics and need a deeper toe box. Compared to my last pair of this model, I found the toe box on this pair to be more shallow. I measured the two pairs with a ruler to make sure and was surprised to see the difference. It's slightly more snug in the width too. NB used to be very consistent and reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Regular User

customer_reviews.title: These are my hubby's favorite.
customer_reviews.text: His old shoes were completely worn out but luckily I found the exact pair on Amazon. He's a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many shoes that were less expensive. Should have started with these! I have Morton neuroma and I can wear these all day with no pain!
customer_reviews.author: James Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great New Balance shoe
customer_reviews.text: Exact shoe from a New Balance store. Saved me an hour trip each way to nearest store and fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: The shoes cost a little more than I typically pay for shoes. However, my old pair of New Balance shoes had served me will and I just pretty much went by that fact. I got the shoe size from my old shoes and the new shoes fit pretty much like the old ones.
customer_reviews.author: STANLEY H BEECH

customer_reviews.title: Only 2A shoes and comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Very have with the fit and comfort. New balance is only brand that has 2A width I can fimd
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: They are nice looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes but, they are supposed to be 2A narrow and they are not. Guess I will customize the inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Quimby

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Pair
customer_reviews.text: I have V1 along with 3 other pairs of NB shoes that have the roll bar, etc.
customer_reviews.author: James Della Volpe

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: This is the third version of this shoe that I have purchased. Always a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the V2
customer_reviews.text: I have always like NB sneakers. The toe box was the reason. The very box seems a little tight, vs the very.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best from NB
customer_reviews.text: I normally have size 8 4E from NB. This one is a bit small. Going back. Need 1/2 size bigger than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Staple shoe for walking and comfortable right out of box
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe right out of the box. Toebox ample for orthotic use. Broadfoot base provides very stable footing. Soul squeaks a bit on wet tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband, they came in the right size and width. Very hard to find 6E shoes.. especially in colors besides white or black. I think they are gonna fit perfect, so I'm giving 5 stars for now just on quality and correct size and product alone. If he has any complaints I will update!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin McCabe

customer_reviews.title: First rate quality
customer_reviews.text: Fit is as described. Happy to find wide width. Worth the cost. Durable. My third pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are the best shoe I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: We will never stop buying 847s. They are the best shoe I've ever owned. I work overnights and walk a lot and also stand on a forklift. My feet never hurt. I seriously can't find any other shoe anywhere that makes my feet feel good
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: A Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from lymphedema and need an exceptionally wide shoe. This one fits great and offers comfort and support. I am very happy with this purchase. Also, the delivery was exactly on time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Voves

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes from one of the few suppliers of a narrow width.
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet and require good support around the heel and ankle. These fit perfectly. Excellent pair of walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Beethoven Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Just a little big; however, tongue cushions resolved the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Mannino

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I always buy New Balance. They always fit perfect and are the most comfortable of any brand out there.
customer_reviews.author: Cookster

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've had many good pairs of New Balance and this pair didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio buyer

customer_reviews.title: New Balance is it!
customer_reviews.text: New Balance always promises. Good fit. Good shoe. Very comfy. What more could you ask.
customer_reviews.author: Sedviga

customer_reviews.title: OK, not great
customer_reviews.text: First pair of V3, probably last. Not as supportive or sturdy as past 847's. I got a great sale price, about 50%. Anything close to full price would be a ripoff considering past versions.
customer_reviews.author: Lee K.

customer_reviews.title: Husband likes them
customer_reviews.text: My husband is fussy about his shoes. He likes these a lot.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Geiman

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected for listed size and width
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of these, replace every 2 years when worn out
customer_reviews.author: S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: A good wide shoe
customer_reviews.text: Put my foot in and right away I could tell I had the room I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Good walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: A nice shoe all the way around, but my heel slips a bit, even using lacelock. I don't expect this to be a problem once the shoe breaks in.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wegner

customer_reviews.title: great long distance walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great support. Excellent distance walking shoe. Too expensive for day-to-day use.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory K.

customer_reviews.title: Squeak with every step.  Mid August, wearing since May, still squeeking.  Never again.
customer_reviews.text: How long does it take these shoes to quit squeaking every time you take a step? I do like the shoes and had the same problem with an earlier pair. I know the squeak will eventually go away. Just wondering how long.
customer_reviews.author: HeweyS

customer_reviews.title: good walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of fitness walking mostly on concrete sidewalks and asphalt trails and so far the shoes have been great , I am able to walk longer distance without sore legs and feet
customer_reviews.author: Russell R

customer_reviews.title: left shoe
customer_reviews.text: I tried to return the shoes in Zephyrhills florida but was informed that I had to have printed number and I do not have a printer. The left shoe is to small but, I have tape up the toes on my left foot until they loosen up. They are the same size as the pair of New balance that I bought in a shoe store in Jackson Michigan but do not feel right.
customer_reviews.author: oldsalt

customer_reviews.title: It looks better and seems a lot better constructed/designed than the 847V2.
customer_reviews.text: It seems a lot better constructed/designed than the 847V2. It looks a lot better too, e.g., red insole.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn D. Larrow

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the new balance shoe good for walking and the insole conforms to your food.
customer_reviews.author: Golfer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit in toe box and heel
customer_reviews.text: Just bought my second pair to keep on hand. I have a lot of foot problems and New Balance 847 and 928 are just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: RAY B

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an identical pair that I bought two years ago and have worn out. They are great for walking and just a generally comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rathnow

customer_reviews.title: A great shoe for people like me with a very narrow ...
customer_reviews.text: A great shoe for people like me with a very narrow width. More expensive than most but happy to find a shoes that fits. I have been buying them for years.
customer_reviews.author: paulfab4

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: This walking shoe fits perfectly, very comfortable, already putting the miles on !!
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable! Awesome Support! {:^)-{{{----[
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable Walking Shoe I ever Owned! It's totally Awesome, will never consider buying anything else in the future!
customer_reviews.author: TWA

customer_reviews.title: hate it
customer_reviews.text: so disappointed spent extra expecting better shoe. they areawful. so cheap feeling and crappily made
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I wore the shoes inside for couple days, felt fine. Began walking outside, felt fine first two times out. Then the problem started. Where the shoe flexes when stepping, right near the bottom outside lace hole, sharp pain pressing down on my foot. Both shoes have this problem. I expect better quality, or quality control, from New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: RVsize9

customer_reviews.title: if you like them.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn New Balance for many years, I don't wear them out they just get looking bad.
customer_reviews.author: RAYMOND PARKER

customer_reviews.title: Mesh problems
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are my go to for comfort and good looking. i wear them when cleaned up to go about daily life however I am dissapointed with the durability of the mesh on side of toe box. In 3 1/2 months the mesh is starting to wear thru..
customer_reviews.author: Nellie  Kerns

customer_reviews.title: and these feel just great.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit very well as expected. They also feel much lighter than expected. I have very difficult to fit feet, and these feel just great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe, durable, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. This is my second pair after 4 years with the first. The first pair is still going, just a bit dirty and scuffed.
customer_reviews.author: FP1

customer_reviews.title: PREFERED WT2 TO THE WT3 BUT WT3 IS STILL VERY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: THEY ARE COMFORTABLE BUT STILL THINK WT2 WAS A LITTLE BETTER
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES G CARROLL

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The 847v3 has a very stiff soul and the bottom inner liner of the shoe has no cushion. This shoe has taken a giant leap backwards when compared to its previous version the 847v2. However, the shoe looks very but I still returned it. I prefer comfort over style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great support but I tend to like a bit more ...
customer_reviews.text: Great support but I tend to like a bit more cushion but I am still breaking them in so may just be initial feel. Fit is perfect I like the 12.5 4e wide
customer_reviews.author: Shawn R. Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Would find something less expensive next time.
customer_reviews.text: + Comfy, good cushion, feet seem less tired at the end of the day. - Not a fashion statement at all. Price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe as it has rounded toe and good width
customer_reviews.author: Charles C. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: Only shoe I’ll buy for work. I was very happy I could buy this shoe in a smaller width! Easier to get from here than store!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Best on your feet!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying New Balance made in USA walking shoes for twenty years. Comfortable, easy on the feet, you’ll never wear something else.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves New Balance. They fit and are comfortable to work and play in.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis L.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing NB for a number of years. Very consistent fit and quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe from Canada

customer_reviews.title: Good for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.text: As a size 13 2A, this is one of the very few shoes I can wear. It does a pretty good job, especially at the Amazon price.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rathburn

customer_reviews.title: Crunch!

customer_reviews.title: very comforble shoe
customer_reviews.text: i like any thing with USA on it , and shoe feels great, size i ordered is right on.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: They fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear 12.5 narrow and the fit is essential. On the expensive side, but a good fitting show is worth it

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of trouble with my feet and this New Balance walking shoe is good. This is my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Love that my doc referred these/rollbar tech to me. They feel great, the firm support for a big dude like me 😎😉
customer_reviews.author: Nathan A. Brummett

customer_reviews.title: Confortable shoes for walking
customer_reviews.text: I like the construction of New Balance shoes. I find the shoes very comfortable for walking long distances for exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Sandman

product_meta.title: New Balance - Mens Enduring Purpose MW847V3 Walking Shoes, 14.5 UK - Width D, White/Grey
product_meta.description: The men's 847v3 is the ideal walking shoe for any man. This style provides endless comfort and support for its wearers. Men's Walking Motion Control 330 grams (11.6 oz) Medicare / HCPCS code = A5500, may be eligible for Medicare reimbursement ABZORB: A superior blend of foam cushioning and compression set, featuring rubber Ndurance: Rubber compound for maximum durability used in high wear areas ROLLBAR: A posting system designed to reduce rear-foot movement Click here to read our blog post about this item Style # MW847WT3
